biotools.summary: Web tool for building structural models for protein sequences using molecular replacement and homology modelling. The software implements an automated approach that uses T-COFFEE to produce alignments, MODELLER to produce homology models, and finally uses AMoRe and CNS to produce the structural model.

bioschemas.name: CaspR
bioschemas.summary: Web tool for building structural models for protein sequences using molecular replacement and homology modelling. The software implements an automated approach that uses T-COFFEE to produce alignments, MODELLER to produce homology models, and finally uses AMoRe and CNS to produce the structural model.
